mil3.4.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.4.7:1.2_0: “Even when you speak with a dragon,
mil3.4.7:1.3_0: that great earth is grounded on water, the water is grounded on air, and it does not exist.”
mil3.4.7:1.4_0: The senior monk took some water and made a foot-stool.
mil3.4.7:1.5_0: “According to this water, the water is cleared up by the wind.”
mil3.4.7:3.1_0: for the seventh part of the earth.
